### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate factory at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0) 

### Iron plate factory at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)

### Unused furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
- Ensure furnace has the required ingredients before starting the smelting process
- Check furnace warnings for 'no ingredients to smelt' before attempting to extract items
### Errors when furnace fuel source is full
- Ensure furnace fuel source is not full before adding more fuel
- Check furnace warnings for 'furnace fuel source is full' before attempting to add fuel
### Errors when furnace source is full
- Ensure furnace source is not full before adding more ingredients
- Check furnace warnings for 'furnace source is full' before attempting to add ingredients
